transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir very good morning main Asim Khan bol raha tha Indiamart.com se Vinod trade industries mein baat ho rahi thi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir aapki company register hai Indiamart ke sath mein to aapka jo account dekhte hain main unka business manager baat kar raha tha sir.
Customer: Ji ji boliye.
Executive: Iski services ke regarding sir main aapse baat karna chah raha tha jo Indiamart aapko service provide karwa raha tha. Jaise sir main dekh raha tha aapne na call bhi kiya hua tha sir aapka call bhi aaya hua tha sir hamare number par but wo baat ho nahi payi thi shayad call miss ho gaya tha sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap mujhe batayenge sir kya yani ki koi kis koi issue vagaira agar aap face kar rahe ho.
Customer: [inaudible] koi lead nahi aayi.
Executive: Kya nahi aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To sir ye jaise aapne pichle mahine mein dekh raha hu kareeb aapne 14 by lead consume kari thi. To ye by lead aapke liye relevant nahi thi sir kya?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aapne pichle mahine kareeb 14 by lead consume kari thi pichle mahine 14 by lead kareeb.
Executive: To ye by leads relevant nahi thi sir aapke liye sir?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kya issue aaya sir in by leads mein aap mujhe batao sir.
Customer: [inaudible] mang rahe hain.
Executive: Aapka sir yahi aapka jo item hai wo yahi hai na ispan polyester thread polyester saving thread industrial saving aapka yahi item hai na sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur aap kahan kahan deal karte hain all over India mein sirf UP mein sir?
Customer: UP mein. UP aur Riva.
Executive: UP aur kahan?
Customer: MP mein jo Riva hai.
Executive: Achcha Riva Riva Madhya Pradesh wo hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha ek minute rukiyega sir aap.
Executive: Ek minute sir call par rahiyega sir aap.
Executive: To sir aapne jaise usme filter lagakar check kara sir jo by leads hum log aapko provide karwa rahe hain jaise main dekh raha tha kuch by leads aayi hui thi sir aapki UP se.
Customer: Haan aayi thi lekin wo kuch kaam ki nahi thi.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Haan ji maine baat kiya tha kaam ki nahi thi.
Executive: Nahi wo to sir main samajh sakta hu sir ho sakta hai.
Executive: Sir dekho aisa ho sakta hai ki kuch kuch buyer se aapne baat kari ho wo kam maal mein kam paiso mein maal mang rahe ho lekin sir agar aap aur bhi use karoge to sir aapko genuine customer waha milenge sir. Rate mein mangte hain kuch aur bhi jyada kam rate mein mangte hain jaise production cost ke bhi niche mangte hain sir.
Executive: Lekin aap aap jyada se jyada by lead use karo to badh jayegi sir use karna band kar doge to bilkul zero ho jayegi. Ab jaise sir ek by lead mere paas aayi hui hai ispan polyester thread ki jaunpur Uttar Pradesh ki sir.
Customer: Jaunpur Uttar Pradesh ki maine [inaudible]
Executive: Three ply three ply inko chahiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir aap Indiamart khol sakte ho koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Second Lucknow jaunpur Uttar Pradesh three ply.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Agar ye relevant hai sir.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Haan ji?
Executive: Achcha uske niche uske niche sir ek uske niche ek aur aayi hui hai ispan polyester thread Lucknow ki kal aayi thi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Minimum kitna rehta hai sir aapka aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Minimum 300 meter.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir 300 meter nahi nahi main ye bol raha hu 1000 meter unhone manga hai 300 300 300 ke teen teen roll bhi to de sakte hain na teen unko piece ja sakte hain na sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir jaise 1000 meter unhone dhaga manga hai aap banate ho 300 meter wala yani ki cone jo banate ho aap.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To 300 meter wale ke sir do teen cone bhi to wo le sakta hai na banda agar hamara hum usse baat karenge to.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Main samajh gaya sir main yani ki mere ghar mein bhi yani ki iska kaam hota hai kya kehte hain jeans manufacturing ka to jeans manufacturing mein sir ye dhage vagaira lagte hain mera bhai mangwata hai to 1000 meter ki bhi nalki aati hai 500 meter ki bhi hoti hai 300 meter ki bhi hoti hai sir uski jo cone hote hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main aapse ye kehna chah raha hu sir bahut sare aise buyer hote hain jo kam ki ya jyada ki requirement dalte hain lekin jab hum unse baat karte hain discussion karte hain aur unko agar hamara price vagaira samajh mein aata hai to wo lete bhi hain jaise agar aap niche dekhoge ispan polyester ispan polyester stitches thread ek lead aur aayi hui hai nogarh ki nogarh Uttar Pradesh ki jisme unhone 20 kilogram dhaga manga hai sir 1000 meter wala.
Executive: Agar ye hama to aise hi sir agar aap rozana dekhoge uske niche ek aur aayi hui hai ispan polyester thread bijnor ki bijnor ki 20 kilogram dhaga unhone manga hua hai sir to aise hi sir hame rozana check karna hai sir aur aapko jo bhi ek do ek do valid relevant lag rahi hai usko use karke baat karna hai jab aap rozana aap ye niyam banao sir ki main rozana ek customer se to baat karunga hi karunga agar aapne rozana ek customer se baat kar li to aapko theek rahega waha par sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir bahut sare sir bahut sare customer aapko aise milenge jo aapko bolenge main sirf aise hi dekh raha tha ya mere ko sirf price janna hai ya meri abhi requirement nahi hai dhoke se mere se pad rahi lekin sir agar aap rozana ek customer se bhi baat karte ho main ye bol raha ki aap sare kaam chhod kar sare kaam Indiamart ko ye pura din Indiamart ko de do lekin agar aap rozana ek 10 15 minute ka time nikal kar rozana ek customer se bhi baat karte ho to mahine mein aap 25 se 30 logo se baat karoge agar 25 30 logo se aapne baat kar li rozana ek customer se to definitely sir aapko do teen positive customer milenge hi milenge har haal mein milenge sir. Isi liye main aapko bol raha hu ki thoda sa sir aap time nikal kar kyunki abhi aapka naya services hai naye service mein client se baat karna discussion karne lagega lekin jaise jaise aap baat karoge aapke follow up banenge customer aapko janega aapki visibility hogi waise waise sir aapko order milne ki possibility rahegi. Isi liye sir main aapko bol raha hu ki rozana time nikal kar jabki aap free hua kare koshish kiya kare ek ya do customer se to aap baat kare hi kare sir aap.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Agar aap jab is tarah se rozana baat karoge na ek do customer se rozana jab aap baat karoge aap dekhna sir automatically milega aap sir abhi mere sath mein sir ek do by lead consume karo sir jo maine aapko teen char by lead batai hai na sir isme se sir aap ek do by lead consume karo jo bhi relevant aapko lag rahi hai ek to kam se kam use karo sir aap.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir aap abhi bilkul bhi nahi kar abhi aapne na sir pichle mahine to use kari thi lekin abhi aapne bilkul bhi nahi kari isi liye sir main aapko bol raha hu ki kam se kam sir aap rozana ek to karo sir aap agar aap karoge na agar aap karna band kar doge to fir dheere dheere aana band ho jayegi aapko inquiry vagaira sara kuch.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Isi liye sir thoda sa aap rozana consume karna start karo aap mere sath abhi call par aap ho kam se kam sir aap ek ya do by lead consume kijiye sir aap jo maine aapko batai hai sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aap consume kijiye sir ek do by lead.
Customer: Jaise health insurance ka kaam karte hain isme add ho sakta hai.
Executive: Kya sir dobara bologe sir aapne kya pucha?
Customer: Main health insurance ka bhi kaam karta hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha yani ki insurance vagaira bhi karwate general insurance motor insurance vagaira.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir aap add nahi kar sakte kyunki uska HSN code alag hota hai iska HSN code alag hai lekin aap kya kar sakte ho aap upar dekho by lead ka section aata hai upar jo by lead ka search ka option aa raha hoga search ka sir aapko.
Executive: Aap search search karke by lead use kar sakte ho sir agar aap by lead use karna chahte ho to by lead use kar sakte ho search karke manually sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir main bata raha hu sir aapko aap customer kaise nikal sakte ho aapne apni by lead vagaira open kara sir aapne?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi upar dekho aapko search ka option aa raha hai search ka option aa raha hai sir.
Executive: Upar dekho search ka option aayega enter product and service to search likha hoga.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Nahi upar upar dekho sabse upar hoga search ka option sabse upar hoga search.
Customer: Search by lead haan.
Executive: Search by lead ab isme sir agar man lo aapko insurance se related by lead kya karni hai to yaha search karke aap check kar sakte ho to jo bhi available by leads hogi wo aapko dikh jayengi agar aap unse baat karna chahte ho to contact buyer now karoge aapki baat ho jayegi sir.
Executive: Samajh gaye sir aap?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Clear hai na sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur abhi sir aap please ek do by lead use kijiyega sir meri call ke sath sath aap use kijiyega by lead ek do sir aur rozana sir aap koshish karo ek do by lead consume karne ki sir.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive suggested using at least one buylead daily.

- Executive explained how to search for insurance leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try to use the buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filter, insurance
